author: giejck18470
body:
## Steps to reproduce

Right click on the windows start button;

Select "Power Shell (Administrator)"
![QQ截图20210609083001](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/83259965/121275209-bd69ad80-c8fe-11eb-85ce-cf4fd8972e97.png)

## Expected behavior

The Power Shell was launched as Administrator;

## Actual behavior

An error message was shown;
![QQ截图20210609082719](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/83259965/121275188-b5aa0900-c8fe-11eb-9366-6cd14bc25c44.png)

## Environment data
Windows 21H1 19043.1023

comments.author: giejck18470
comments.body:
Because of some unknown reason, this file was missing on my computer.
I am trying to find it out.

title: Menu of Windows 10 start icon can not launch Power Shell;
